name: 6: The Game
description:
Originally meant for GMTK Game Jam 2022 (Roll of the dice). Took a bit more time.

Beat 6 levels to get to the end. Each time you get one of the six levels, and one of the six characters (each with their own goal), all decided by a dice.

The game features two secret levels, as well as secret good and bad endings. Look for the smallest clues to find them, and get the best possible outcome.
